last_episode_to_air.name: Remember the New Beginning?
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the land where their ancestors hosted their first reunion, the McKellans gather for a celebration of delicious food, family ties and new beginnings.

name: Family Reunion
overview: Family Reunion follows a family of six who travel from Seattle, Washington to Columbus, Georgia for the McKellan Family Reunion and decide to stay to be closer to their family.
tagline: Gonna need two plates for this one.

episodes.name: Remember How This All Started?
episodes.overview: The McKellans head to a family reunion at M'Dear and Grandpa's house, where Moz, Cocoa and the kids consider a simpler life away from city comforts.

episodes.name: Remember Charlie Wilson?
episodes.overview: While cleaning out the attic, Mazzi and Shaka find M'Dear's private mementos from a famous singer -- a discovery that stirs up drama with Grandpa.

episodes.name: Remember Vacation Bible School?
episodes.overview: When Moz gifts the kids go-karts, Cocoa is less than thrilled. Jade uses an app to try and outsmart M'Dear, an undisputed "Bible champion."

episodes.name: Remember When I Lost My Sister?
episodes.overview: Cocoa's unconventional beliefs shock M'Dear's Bible-study group. Jade uses sisterly bonding for quality time with Drew -- until she forgets about Ami.

episodes.name: Remember Grace Under Fire?
episodes.overview: The family's religious role model, Auntie Grace, reveals her secret passion. When a kitchen fire erupts, Moz teaches the kids the importance of honesty.

episodes.name: Remember That Crazy Road Trip?
episodes.overview: The McKellans recall a cross-country move to Georgia that was packed with misadventure, from a weird proposal and a creepy ritual to a frisky raccoon.

episodes.name: Remember the First Day of School?
episodes.overview: As the kids start a new school year, Jade takes a stand against a strict dress code, Mazzi opts to redo fourth grade and Shaka eyes a potential crush.

episodes.name: Remember Macho Mazzi?
episodes.overview: When Jade competes in a pageant, she recruits a former beauty queen to be her coach. Meanwhile, Mazzi tests his "macho" abilities to impress Moz.

episodes.name: Remember Black Elvis?
episodes.overview: After M'Dear shares the family's rich history with the kids, Moz and Cocoa are inspired to carry on the tradition.

episodes.name: Remember When Our Boys Became Men?
episodes.overview: M'Dear introduces Jade to a new boy, and Mazzi and Shaka find a job to earn extra money. But an encounter with a cop soon has the family on edge.

episodes.name: Remember the Dance Battle?
episodes.overview: To go on a school trip, Jade is forced to ace math as her teacher starts dating Daniel. Shaka's step team tryout fires up Cocoa's competitive streak.

episodes.name: Remember When Daddy Came Home?
episodes.overview: Jade manages Mazzi's music group, which becomes a hit at church. As Ami works to overcome her fear of getting baptized, Moz has a spiritual awakening.

episodes.name: Remember Our Parents' Wedding?
episodes.overview: Before Moz and Cocoa say "I do" again, Shaka is tasked with keeping the ring, Cocoa confronts her mother and Daniel makes a sacrifice.

episodes.name: Remember When Jade Was Down with the Swirl?
episodes.overview: Jade faces criticism over a new crush. Moz and Mazzi try to keep their cool in a basketball game when a rival trash-talks them ... until M'Dear steps in.

episodes.name: Remember When Shaka Got Beat Up?
episodes.overview: An encounter with a bully inspires Shaka to try martial arts. To earn money for concert tickets, Jade gets ambitious about babysitting.

episodes.name: Remember the G Club?
episodes.overview: Jade searches for her singing voice and befriends an aspiring rapper-producer. Pressed for time, Mazzi asks M'Dear for help with a school project.

episodes.name: Remember Cousin Kenya?
episodes.overview: Jade and Aunt Maybelle bring dates to meet the family. Cocoa looks into an opportunity for her jewelry line, and M'Dear conducts an interrogation.

episodes.name: Remember M'dear's Fifteen Minutes?
episodes.overview: Shaka snoops into Jade's diary and uses a secret to blackmail her -- until she gets dirt on him. M'Dear steals Moz's thunder on a sports talk show.

episodes.name: Remember When the Party Was Over?
episodes.overview: Jade hosts a masquerade party for her 15th birthday so she can sneak someone in. Meanwhile, Moz and Cocoa get a reality check about their finances.

episodes.name: Remember Mazzi's First Love?
episodes.overview: Mazzi and Uncle Daniel set their sights on the same woman. M'Dear becomes obsessed with bingo. An injured Moz considers a return to football.

episodes.name: Remember When Jade Broke a Nail?
episodes.overview: A heartbroken Jade joins Shaka's dojo while Mazzi learns to strike back at a bully. Moz looks to repair Cocoa's car on his own, but M'Dear interferes.

episodes.name: Remember When Cocoa Was a Housewife?
episodes.overview: Before Moz and Cocoa say "I do" again, Shaka is tasked with keeping the ring, Cocoa confronts her mother and Daniel makes a sacrifice.

episodes.name: Remember When M'Dear Changed History?
episodes.overview: When a historic hotel is on the verge of being demolished, M"Dear chains herself in protest and recalls meeting various icons.

episodes.name: Remember the False Idol?
episodes.overview: Shaka deals with rejection. A risqu sculpture of Moz and Cocoa drives M'Dear mad. Jade learns her history after receiving her DNA test results.

episodes.name: Remember When Shaka Did the Robot?
episodes.overview: Jade gives M'Dear a stylish makeover. Moz and Cocoa stress about funds when Shaka gets into a gifted science program.

episodes.name: Remember When the Glass Passed?
episodes.overview: With Principal Glass' untimely passing, the McKellans teach the kids about the circle of life. Mark Curry guest stars in his final episode.

episodes.name: Remember When Cocoa Found Her Calling?
episodes.overview: M'Dear takes over Cocoa's Zumba ministry to win a bet. A classmate makes racially insensitive comments when Jade wins a fashion contest.

episodes.name: Remember When the Trick Wasnt a Treat?
Remember When M'Dear Stole the Show?
Remember When Jade Thought She Was Grown?
Remember the Story MDear Hates to Tell?
Remember When Cocoa Did It All?
Remember When the Skye Fell?
episodes.overview: The family steps up when Cocoa goes into labor while Moz and Grandpa race back home from Miami. At the hospital, complications arise.

episodes.name: Remember the New Additon to the Family?
episodes.overview: A popular rapper asks M'Dear and Jade to sing on his new track. When Aunt Maureen and Tyson visit, the McKellans learn they've been having a tough time.

episodes.name: Remember Stompin' the Yard?
episodes.overview: A lovesick Jade makes a plan to surprise her boyfriend. But her solo trip soon turns into a college tour at an HBCU with M'Dear, Mazzi and Tyson.

episodes.name: Remember the Homecoming Queen?
episodes.overview: Jeb receives life-changing news that brings the family together. Meanwhile, Tyson's loyalties are divided when Jade runs for homecoming queen.

episodes.name: Remember When Elvis Broke Jesus?
episodes.overview: Mazzi and Tyson plot to throw a secret party at the church. While working as Moz's assistant, Jade takes on more than she can handle.

episodes.name: Remember When the Raccoon Crashed the Wedding?
episodes.overview: The eve before Maybelle's wedding brings chaos for the whole family as the men take on a pesky critter and the ladies settle disputes of their own.

episodes.name: Remember When Mazzi Almost Lost It?
episodes.overview: Mazzi feels pressure to take his relationship to the next level. Jade learns the truth about Tyson's girlfriend. Moz and Cocoa enter a salsa competition.

episodes.name: Remember When Jade Walked in M'Dear's Shoes?
episodes.overview: When an uninspired Jade clashes with M'Dear, a shocking moment forces both of them to experience life from a new perspective.

episodes.name: Remember Our 20 Acres and a Deed?
episodes.overview: Jeb and M'Dear tell the story of how their ancestors were given land that was taken from them decades ago, inspiring Mazzi, Tyson and Ami to take action.

episodes.name: Remember the New Beginning?
episodes.overview: On the land where their ancestors hosted their first reunion, the McKellans gather for a celebration of delicious food, family ties and new beginnings.
